net.sourceforge.taglets.simple
Interface SimpleTaglet

All Known Subinterfaces:
BlockTaglet, InlineTaglet
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSimpleTaglet, ClassNameInlineTaglet, ConstantsBlockTaglet, DefinitionListBlockTaglet, FileCopier, IgnoreBlockTaglet, IgnoreInlineTaglet, ParamBlockTaglet, ParamInlineTaglet, RegexBlockTaglet, RegexInlineTaglet, RegexReplacer, SimpleRegexBlockTaglet, SinceBlockTaglet, TableInlineTaglet, TextFilterBlockTaglet, TextFilterInlineTaglet, TextFilterTaglet
public interface SimpleTaglet

Base interface for all "simple" taglets.

Method Detail

configure

void configure(Logger logger,
               Configuration configuration)
Configures this "simple" taglet.

Notes:

The configure(Logger, Configuration) method is called at the start of the taglet lifecycle, prior to calling any output methods.

The configuration parameters of each "simple" taglet are taglet specific.

Parameters:
logger - the logger to use for message output during configuration.
configuration - the taglets configuration to use for configuration.
Since:
1.5.2

getName

String getName()
Returns the name of the "simple" taglet.

Denotes the name of the tag that refers to this taglet, e.g. for an inline tag {@inline} return "inline", for a block tag called @block return "block".

Returns:
the name of the taglet.
Since:
1.5.2
